```{r}
#white wine analysis
library(readr)
winequality_white <- read_delim("~/Desktop/wine-quality/wine+quality+raw/winequality-white.csv", 
    delim = ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
View(winequality_white)


# bot plots
boxplot(winequality_white)
#analysis we can see that free sulfer dioxide and total sulfer dioxide is highly variable.

library(psych)
describe(winequality_white)

#correlation plots
#install.packages("ggcorrplot")
library(ggcorrplot)

# Compute correlation at 2 decimal places
corr_matrix = round(cor(winequality_white), 2)
# Compute and show the  result
ggcorrplot(corr_matrix, hc.order = TRUE, type = "lower",
          lab = TRUE)




#linear models
white_lm <- lm( quality ~. , data = winequality_white)
summary(white_lm)

#residuals
# Get the model residuals
model_residuals = white_lm$residuals

# Plot the result of the residuals
hist(model_residuals)

#we can see that the residuals are slightly normal


```
